name: Galaxy Raiders (Mobile)
description:
A downloadable game for mobile on the Android Playstore and the Apple App Store. See the download links below.

I hope this game gives you joy.

Galaxy Raiders is a top down bulletstorm endless arcade shooter in space! Defeat each wave of enemies to collect loot, upgrade your character, a completely offline single player experience. 

  • Developer: reallyskint
  • Artist: Lovely folks

Special thanks to everyone involve over the year making this, friends, family and all.
